game.name: SEARCH ALL - POTIONS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the cones / vessels with potions on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location depicts a medieval extraordinary city
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the cones / vessels with potions on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location depicts a medieval extraordinary city

reviewHighlights.text: By the 79 potion I assumed that the last potion must have been in plain sight, but after not finding it in plain sight, I've figured that after all it...
